headline.main: Pope Francis and Abbas meet following Palestine treaty
headline.sub: Pope Francis and Abbas meet following Palestine treaty

docs.snippet: Days after the Vatican concluded a treaty more formally recognizing the state of Palestine, Pope Francis and Palestinian leader Mahmoud Abbas meet in Vatican City. Gavino Garay reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Days after the Vatican concluded a treaty more formally recognizing the state of Palestine, Pope Francis and Palestinian leader Mahmoud Abbas meet in Vatican City. Gavino Garay reports.

headline.main: Freefalling Newcastle Face Do or Die Last Game-Carver
headline.print_headline: Freefalling Newcastle Face Do or Die Last Game-Carver

docs.snippet: Manager John Carver said fourth from bottom Newcastle United face one of the biggest games in their history next weekend after Saturday's 2-1 defeat at Queens Park Rangers left them staring relegation in the face....
docs.lead_paragraph: Manager John Carver said fourth from bottom Newcastle United face one of the biggest games in their history next weekend after Saturday's 2-1 defeat at Queens Park Rangers left them staring relegation in the face.

headline.main: Bruce Manages a Smile After Hardest Week as Manager
headline.print_headline: Bruce Manages a Smile After Hardest Week as Manager

docs.snippet: Hull City's Steve Bruce was left to ponder his hardest week as a manager after a 2-0 defeat at Tottenham Hotspur on Saturday left them perilously close to relegation from the Premier League....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hull City's Steve Bruce was left to ponder his hardest week as a manager after a 2-0 defeat at Tottenham Hotspur on Saturday left them perilously close to relegation from the Premier League.

docs.snippet: Leicester City manager Nigel Pearson paid tribute to his team's mental strength and resilience after ensuring their Premier League survival against all the odds with a 0-0 draw at Sunderland on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Leicester City manager Nigel Pearson paid tribute to his team's mental strength and resilience after ensuring their Premier League survival against all the odds with a 0-0 draw at Sunderland on Saturday.

headline.main: Amtrak Ordered to Take Rail Safety Steps After Crash
headline.print_headline: Amtrak Ordered to Take Rail Safety Steps After Crash

docs.snippet: U.S. regulators have ordered passenger railroad Amtrak to improve the safety of its heavily traveled Northeast Corridor route following Tuesday's derailment in Philadelphia that killed eight people, the Federal Railroad Administration said on Satu...
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. regulators have ordered passenger railroad Amtrak to improve the safety of its heavily traveled Northeast Corridor route following Tuesday's derailment in Philadelphia that killed eight people, the Federal Railroad Administration said on Saturday.

headline.main: IS Group Enters Syrian Town of Palmyra, Nears Ancient Ruins
headline.print_headline: IS Group Enters Syrian Town of Palmyra, Nears Ancient Ruins

docs.snippet: Activists say Islamic State fighters have pushed into the Syrian town of Palmyra, home to famed 2,000-year-old ruins....
docs.lead_paragraph: Activists say Islamic State fighters have pushed into the Syrian town of Palmyra, home to famed 2,000-year-old ruins.

headline.main: Toy Retailer FAO Schwarz to Close Flagship New York City Store
headline.print_headline: Toy Retailer FAO Schwarz to Close Flagship New York City Store

docs.snippet: FAO Schwarz, the oldest toy store in the United States and a retailer once considered accessible only to the rich, is closing its much-loved Fifth Avenue flagship store in Manhattan, citing rising rent prices....
docs.lead_paragraph: FAO Schwarz, the oldest toy store in the United States and a retailer once considered accessible only to the rich, is closing its much-loved Fifth Avenue flagship store in Manhattan, citing rising rent prices.

headline.main: France Calls for Fairer Asylum Seeker Distribution Within EU
headline.print_headline: France Calls for Fairer Asylum Seeker Distribution Within EU

docs.snippet: The European Union needs a system of border controls and a way for asylum seekers to be more fairly distributed among EU member states, French Prime Minister Manuel Valls said on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The European Union needs a system of border controls and a way for asylum seekers to be more fairly distributed among EU member states, French Prime Minister Manuel Valls said on Saturday.

headline.main: Britons Morrison and Howell Lead Way as Sergio Surges
headline.print_headline: Britons Morrison and Howell Lead Way as Sergio Surges

docs.snippet: Britons James Morrison and David Howell both overcame double-bogeys to share the lead after the third round of the Spanish Open on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Britons James Morrison and David Howell both overcame double-bogeys to share the lead after the third round of the Spanish Open on Saturday.
